name: Building Electrification Rebate Program
description: $500 rebate for city residents to install heat pump hot water heater, $500 for high-efficiency heat pump, up to $500 for electrical panel upgrade; CARE customers get additional $500
fullDescription: The City of Redwood City offers rebates to help residents electrify their homes with heat pump water heaters, HVAC systems, and electrical panel upgrades.
whatTheyOffer:
- $500 rebate for heat pump water heater
- $500 rebate for high-efficiency heat pump HVAC
- Up to $500 for electrical panel upgrade
- Additional $500 for CARE customers on each rebate
- Can combine with other incentives
- For Redwood City residents only
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Redwood City resident
2. Install qualifying equipment
3. Apply through City of Redwood City website
4. Submit proof of purchase and installation
5. CARE customers submit CARE enrollment proof
6. Receive rebate check
keywords: Redwood City, electrification, heat pump, water heater, HVAC, panel upgrade, $500, CARE, rebate
